Package peregrine.io.util

IO utilities, usually for dealing with multiple files, closing resoures, etc.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BaseCloser<T> Implements JDK 1.7 try-with-resources style closing for multiple Closeables.
Closer Implements JDK 1.7 try-with-resources style closing for multiple Closeables.
Files Handles a facade on top of various bulk filesystem manipulation primitives.
Flusher Flusher similar to Closer which calls Flusher.flush().
Recursively<T extends Throwable> Handles listing the files, looking to see if they are directories, and if so handling each directory.
 

Exception Summary
GroupIOException Implements JDK 1.7 try-with-resources style closing for multiple Closeables / Flushables with an exception that includes all exceptions.
 

Package peregrine.io.util Description

IO utilities, usually for dealing with multiple files, closing resoures, etc.
